reporting-org.narrative: Local Development and small projects support

title.narrative: Supporting the capacity building of Kesh Malek

description.narrative: Supporting the capacity building actions of Kesh Malek

title.narrative: LDSPS and Kesh Malek have increased capacity to achieve their strategic plan for local support in Syria
Increase of Kesh Malek organisational capacity (hired team- trained Staff)

description.narrative: KM organizational capacity is to be measured through the demonstartion of various factors that indicate- as a whole- the strenght of an LC. These factors are: • Hired team in Turkey and in-country •Trained staff *Based on KM performance- each item will be given a mark of 0- 0.5 or 1. (100%=2) //Disaggreated by : N/A

comment.narrative: only hiring took place while training will be implemented during 2018

title.narrative: Kesh Malek team members are hired according to plan
Nb of people partially or fully covered

description.narrative: KM will cover salaries for staff in Turkey and in-country offices on cost share basis to manage the project activities and to fulfill donors' requirement in addition to support the capacity improvement of KM//Disaggreated by : By gender - position

comment.narrative: kesh Malek increased the number of hired persons, on a cost-share wises with other donors (budget still same)

title.narrative: Training courses for Kesh Malek staff are done

description.narrative: KM staff will be trained during the life of the project on various topics including technical and financial management//Disaggreated by : By gender

comment.narrative: this activity will be implemented during 2018

description.narrative: Training hours on the managerial and technical topics according to KM organizational needs//Disaggreated by : N/A
